doc.plot: Rosa is an illegal immigrant without a residence permit. After having been deceived, she wanders through the streets of Milan without a place to go. Exhausted, she gets shelter in a cafÃ©, where a clash with the other customers will arise for apparently trivial reasons that will, however, result in unexpected outcomes.
